channel.title: Adding Shops
channel.description: So if it helps the base I am using is Winterlove V.3 and I am having a little trouble on adding shops. I add the shop in autospawn.cfg, and shops.cfg, but after I compile, and restart the server, I do not see that shop in the coordinates I set them to? Thank-you in advance for those who answer?

item.title: Adding Shops
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

So if it helps the base I am using is Winterlove V.3 and I am having a little trouble on adding shops. I add the shop in autospawn.cfg, and shops.cfg, but after I compile, and restart the server, I do not see that shop in the coordinates I set them to? Thank-you in advance for those who answer?
